casebody.data:
IN RE SAVANNAH Y. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 10, 2017 David B. Rozwaski, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Cynthia E. Mahon, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent mother for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 266 , 158 A.3d 864 (2017), is denied.

EVELEIGH and D'AURIA, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
